de.mpg.biochem.mars.swingUI.MoleculeArchiveSelector

Class MoleculeArchiveTreeNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mpg.biochem.mars.swingUI.MoleculeArchiveSelector.MoleculeArchiveTreeNode
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MoleculeArchiveSwingTreeNode

    public class MoleculeArchiveTreeNode
extends java.lang.Object
    A node representing a dataset or group in a container and child nodes if any exist.

        public static MoleculeArchiveTreeNode fromFlatList(java.lang.String base,
                                                   java.lang.String[] pathList,
                                                   java.lang.String groupSeparator)
        Generates a tree based on the output of MoleculeArchiveStorage.deepList(java.lang.String, java.util.function.Predicate<java.lang.String>), returning the root node.
        Parameters:
        base - the path used to call deepList
        pathList - the output of deepList
        groupSeparator - the n5 group separator
        Returns:
        the root node

      • fromFlatList

        public static void fromFlatList(MoleculeArchiveTreeNode root,
                                java.lang.String[] pathList,
                                java.lang.String groupSeparator)
        Generates a tree based on the output of MoleculeArchiveStorage.deepList(java.lang.String, java.util.function.Predicate<java.lang.String>), returning the root node.
        Parameters:
        root - the root node corresponding to the base
        pathList - the output of deepList
        groupSeparator - the n5 group separator

      • removeLeadingSlash

        protected static java.lang.String removeLeadingSlash(java.lang.String pathName)
        Removes the leading slash from a given path and returns the corrected path. It ensures correctness on both Unix and Windows, otherwise pathName is treated as UNC path on Windows, and Paths.get(pathName, ...) fails with InvalidPathException.
        Parameters:
        pathName - the path
        Returns:
        the corrected path
